#include<iostream>
#include<string>

using namespace std;

void swap(string &s,int i,int j);

bool next_lexicographic(string &s);

int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);

    int t;

    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        string s;

        cin>>s;

        if(next_lexicographic(s))
            cout<<s<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"no answer"<<endl;
    }
    return(0);
}

void swap(string &s,int i, int j)
{
    char temp=s[i];
    s[i]=s[j];
    s[j]=temp;
}

bool next_lexicographic(string &s)
{
    int i=s.length()-1;

    while(i>0 && s[i-1]>=s[i])
        i--;

    if(i<=0)
        return(false);

    int j=s.length()-1;

    while(j>=i && s[j]<=s[i-1])
        j--;

    swap(s,j,i-1);

    j=s.length()-1;
    while(i<j)
    {
        swap(s,i,j);
        i++;
        j--;
    }

    return(true);
}
